mods:titleInfo.mods:title: ACC-PARC News Conference Regarding Louis Novak

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A transcript for an ACC-PARC news conference regarding the death of Louis Novak, a resident of Ridgeview Center. ACC-PARC claims that Novak's death, as well as the deaths of other patients at interim care facilities, were preventable and demands that the state investigate and prosecute negligent and abusive facilities.
